name: Taku
description:
It's a plataform game about a ronin (a samurai who's lost his lord) that is seeking forgiveness and a new place to call home.

Use the ARROW KEYS,  SHIFT,  X and Z to look for home and self forgiveness.

I did it with jposawa. It was our submission to the global game jam (but we posted here another version of it). It's not completed and there are a lot of stuff we know that we can improve, but we'd still like to have a feedback :)
